pr_title: Port of CaaSP management fixes + system-lock formula dependency

timeline.bodyText:
Doc (and release notes) says:

When you have added the {caasp} nodes to {productname}, the registered system will be locked automatically. When a system is locked, the {webui} shows a warning and you can schedule actions using the {webui} or the API, but the action will fail.

Is it "some" actions or "all actions"? What the doc and the release notes say is, FMPOV: All actions.
However it seems the formula says otherwise: SUSE/salt-formulas#42 (review)
So it's "all", "all except", or "some"?
